title: Chestnut Embroidered Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a chestnut brown midi dress with intricate tonal floral embroidery across bodice and hem, short puff sleeves, sweetheart neckline, fitted waist, A-line silhouette, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, isolated on plain white background
techpack: Chestnut brown cotton sateen midi dress with polyester lining; sweetheart neckline; short puff sleeves; fitted bodice with waist seam; A-line skirt; tonal floral embroidery on bodice and hem; invisible back zipper; waist seam piping; hem finished with blind stitch.
provenance: Designed based on trend combination of brown color and embroidery, inspired by contemporary ethnic-fusion womenswear.
design_text:
Chestnut Embroidered Midi Dress (BR-EMB-001)
Colors: chestnut brown, warm beige, gold thread
Fabrics: cotton sateen, polyester lining
Prints/Patterns: floral embroidery
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short puff sleeves
Neckline: sweetheart
Length: midi
Style / Fit: f, i, t, t, e, d,  , b, o, d, i, c, e,  , w, i, t, h,  , f, l, a, r, e, d,  , s, k, i, r, t
Trims & details: tonal floral embroidery, invisible back zipper, waist seam piping
Techpack: available
